oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Charlie McCoy - 2015-03-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance and harmonic demonstration by Charlie McCoy from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 9, 2015. Joined by musician Hoot Hester.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie McCoy; Hoot Hester
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program includes; unidentified guitar and harmonica instrumental -- demonstration of first songs learned on harmonica -- demonstration of chromatic harmonica styles -- demonstration of bass harmonica -- first recording sessions -- plays hits medley (Candy Man -- Delta Dawn -- He Stopped Loving Her Today -- I Was Country When Country Wasn't Cool -- Old Dogs, Children And Watermelon Wine) -- Introduction of Hoot Hester -- Today I Started Loving You Again -- John Henry -- I Can't Help It (If I'm Still In Love With You) -- Somewhere Over The Rainbow -- Harmonica Jones -- Shenandoah - The Water Is Wide -- Orange Blossom Special.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McCoy, Charlie, 1941- ; Hester, Hoot; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
